content:
Today I chose issue 5863 for discussion!

Make linters emit messages in a way that's understood by GitHub
Created by @Bryan Gin-ge Chen (@bryangingechen) on 2021-01-23
Labels: CI, feature-request

Is this issue still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
Triage bot inspired me, so I made a first pass on this at #11345
This is now ready for review, but probably doesn't come up on the queue as it has intentional linter failures so that reviewers can check how the annotations come out
